views.markdown:
This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 10

On iOS 9? Try

Noctis is a stunning dark mode for iOS. Noctis has 3 levels of darkness to choose from, light, medium and dark. You can also add your own custom color tint.

It changes:

1. Control Center
2. Notifications
3. Widgets
4. Folders
5. Dock
6. Share Sheets

For iOS 10. All iPad, iPhone and iPod devices.

This item is now Free. - Fixed Flipswitch Bug fixes and improvements Added Eleven Support Fixed doubleup on 3D touch text. Changelog:

Fixed some Noctis side issues with Unify.

Added ability to disable CC effect.

Added ability to disable Notifications effect.

Added ability to disable HUD effect.

Fixed crash relating Printer Pro application.

Fixed SpringBoard crash issues.

Another attempt to fix cornering issues on white backgrounds, works sometimes, but not others :(

Fixed schedule feature. Wasn't working for some users.
1. Fixed text disappearing and crash issue

Adds activator gesture (requires flipswitch)
Bug Fixes.
Noctis 1.9
1. Added Cheader Support
2. Added CleanNotifications10 Support
3. Added ColorBanners 2 Support
4. Added Extra Transparency option for Notifications and Widgets.
5. Added Inverse Header option for Notifications and Widgets.
6. Fixed text on alerts not being correctly colored if use sheets is disabled.
7. Removed need for flipswitch.
